## Web3Tokens.erc1155() method

Create a builder for an ERC-1155 token witch allows to add extensions such as Ownable, Mintable, Pausable, etc...

**Signature:**

```typescript
erc1155(): ERC1155Builder;
```
**Returns:**

ERC1155Builder
